title: Kale and Carrot Soup
process: In a large pot, heat olive oil on medium-high heat and saut√© onion, celery and carrots for minutes. Then add mushrooms, garlic, and continue to stir for an additional 3 minutes.
Stir in vegetable stock, lemon juice, peppers, turmeric, salt and chickpeas. Cover and turn heat to simmer for 15 minutes.
Add kale and simmer for an additional 3-5 minutes.
Garnish your bowl of soup with a slice of lemon and added pepper flakes if you want to spice things up.
